segments.text: I see the water just gushing out of the sink, and the woman doesn’t even blink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is soaked, but she’s still polishing that plate like nothing’s wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is reaching for cookies, and that stool is definitely going to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm the woman is while everything is falling apart around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is so peaceful, it’s almost funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting wetter, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll even notice when the stool finally tips over.
segments.speaker: PAR
